description: California lilac (Ceanothus pallidus 'Minmari' MARIE BLEU) is an incredibly unique and beautiful shrub. It exudes colorful, fragrant blooms of deep blue-violet throughout the warmer months of the year. This deciduous evergreen is also drought-tolerant and provides a wonderful source of color and texture in any landscape. The rich foliage of Marie Bleu is an inviting shade of blue-green and pairs perfectly with other shrubs and small trees. Its strong growth and quick rate make it an ideal choice for erosion control, ground-cover or privacy screens. This amazing plant is sure to be the star of any yard and provide enjoyment for all.
